--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Perceptor:
> 
> Perceptor continued firigna gainst Malice
> 
>
> Malice:
> 
> The armor on his back was beginning to degrade, but it would hold a
> while longer.  Malice now had Myrmidon where he wanted him, he 
> reached down to clamp a crushing hand on his wrist and twisted.  He 
> slammed his tail into the ceiling of the corridor and now had 
> leverage, so he pulled Myrmidon up enough try a knock out punch 
> across the face.
> 
> "Nothing... you do... will defeat me!"

Myrmidon's head rocked back from the force of the blow, a bit of his
ocular armor cracked from the force of Malice's blow. "Defeat you?"
Myrmidon chuckled, "You are weak and pathetic, only able to feel
powerful when you are lucky enough to defeat someone!" Myrmidon reared
back and swung at Malice, trading his blow for one of his own. "Once
we're done with slapping party, maybe we will just lock you up again!"

Preston 
(Myrmidon)
